briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy of Nyxol (0.75% Phentolamine Ophthalmic Solution) in Subjects With Dim Light Vision Disturbances
officialTitle: Randomized, Placebo-Controlled, Double-Masked Study of the Safety and Efficacy of Nyxol (0.75% Phentolamine Ophthalmic Solution) in Subjects With Dim Light Vision Disturbances
summary:
The objectives of this study are:

* To evaluate the efficacy of Nyxol to improve mesopic low contrast visual acuity (mLCVA) in subjects with Dim Light Vision Disturbances (DLD)
* To evaluate efficacy of Nyxol to improve visual performance
* To evaluate the safety of Nyxol

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent of Subjects With 3 Lines mLCVA Improvement in Study Eye
